menu_inspire_mod_desc: BASIC: ##$basic##$NL;There is a ##75%## chance that you can revive crew members by melee. You manually revive crew members ##100%## faster. Shouting at your teammates will increase their movement and reload speed by ##20%## for ##10## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro##$NL;There is a ##100%## chance that you can revive crew members at a distance of up to ##8## meters by shouting at them. Crew members must be in line of sight. This can only be used ##5## times per heist.
